RNS Number : 8311OAirtel Africa PLC13 October 2021

Airtel Africa plc

('Airtel Africa', or 'Group')

Notice of half year results to 30 September 2021

London and Lagos, 13 October 2021 : Airtel Africa, a leading provider of telecommunications and mobile money services, with a presence in 14 countries across Africa, will announce its results for the six months ending 30 September 2021 on 28 October 2021.

Management will host a presentation and conference call on the day of the results for analysts and investors at 12:00 BST (London time).

Participants are requested to pre-register for the event by navigating to: https://services.choruscall.za.com/DiamondPassRegistration/register?confirmationNumber=1696896&linkSecurityString=2eb584280

For further details, please visit airtel.africa/investors

-ENDS-

About Airtel Africa

Airtel Africa is a leading provider of telecommunications and mobile money services, with a presence in 14 countries in Africa, primarily in East Africa and Central and West Africa.

Airtel Africa offers an integrated suite of telecommunications solutions to its subscribers, including mobile voice and data services as well as mobile money services both nationally and internationally.

The Group aims to continue providing a simple and intuitive customer experience through streamlined customer journeys.

www.airtel.africa
